title: The Yellow Birds by Kevin Powers

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Powers uses literary elements and techniques to reveal Private Bartle’s complex perspective.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Powers uses literary elements and techniques to reveal Private Bartle’s complex perspective.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
